metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4201 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A blind SSRF in GitLab CE/EE affecting all from 11.3 prior to 15.4.6, 15.5prior to 15.5.5, and 15.6 prior to 15.6.1 allows an attacker to connect tolocal addresses when configuring a malicious GitLab Runner.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
